column1: Uchi////Love Uchi.  Always amazing food and layers of great flavors.  Very unique dishes like Ham and Eggs made with porkbelly.  Foie gras sushi pieces are heavenly. Karage chicken is crazy tasty.  Walu  Walu
column3: hama chili are all favorites.  They have great
column4: attentive service team.   Love the deserts.   Order one of each.  I like the fried milk.
